original_text: All the officials did come to Jeremiah and question him, and he told them everything the king had ordered him to say. So they said no more to him, for no one had heard his conversation with the king.
korean_text: 모든 고관이 예레미야에게 와서 물으매 그가 왕이 명령한 모든 말대로 대답하였으므로 일이 탄로되지 아니하였고 그들은 그와 더불어 말하기를 그쳤더라
